name: ObjectStyleContentEffectsCategorySettings
shortdesc: Object style content effects category settings.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the ObjectStyleContentEffectsCategorySettings &#40;a ObjectStyle).

property.name: enableTransparency
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply transparency settings.

property.name: enableDropShadow
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply drop shadows.

property.name: enableFeather
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply feathering.

property.name: enableInnerShadow
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply inner shadows.

property.name: enableOuterGlow
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply outer glow.

property.name: enableInnerGlow
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply inner glow.

property.name: enableBevelEmboss
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply bevel emboss.

property.name: enableSatin
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply satin.

property.name: enableDirectionalFeather
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply directional feathering.

property.name: enableGradientFeather
property.shortdesc: If true, the object style will apply gradient feathering.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ObjectStyleContentEffectsCategorySettings.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
